name: xxpix7
description: An advanced pixel sorting effect with customizable thresholds, angle, noise, randomness, and strip control.

paramDescriptions.threshold_min: Minimum pixel value to be considered for sorting (based on selected sorting style).
paramDescriptions.threshold_max: Maximum pixel value to be considered for sorting (based on selected sorting style).
paramDescriptions.randomness: Percentage of intervals that remain unsorted.
paramDescriptions.angle: Angle for pixel sorting strips, where positive values rotate clockwise and negative values counterclockwise.
paramDescriptions.strip_width: Width of each sorting strip in pixels.
paramDescriptions.strip_spacing: Space between pixel-sorted strips in pixels.
paramDescriptions.pulling_distance: How far pixels are pulled from their original position along the sorting strip.
paramDescriptions.char_length: Characteristic length for intervals. Used in generating random widths.
paramDescriptions.sorting_style: Defines sorting based on Hue (0), Saturation (1), or Lightness (2).
paramDescriptions.noise_strength: Strength of the added noise after the pixel sorting effect.
